name: Roberto Luongo Quiz / Test | NHL Players | 10 Questions

questions.text: What team did Roberto play for during the 2007-08 season?
questions.explanation:
Vancouver Canucks.

	Luongo used to play for the Panthers, but was traded to the Canucks with Lukas Krajicek and a draft pick for Todd Bertuzzi, Alex Auld, and Bryan Allen.

questions.text: Who did Roberto replace as captain of the Vancouver Canucks in 2008?
questions.explanation:
Markus Naslund.

	The team decided not to renew Naslund's contract.  He signed with the New York Rangers.

questions.text: Luongo was drafted ____overall by the New York Islanders in 1997.
questions.explanation:
4th.

	At the time, he was the highest drafted goalie in league history.

questions.text: Roberto won _____ Vezina trophies for the leagues best goalie while playing for Florida from 2001-2006.
questions.explanation:
0.

	Roberto had not won the Vezina trophy with any team before the 2008-09 season.

questions.text: Which 3 awards did Luongo finish runner up for in 2007?
questions.explanation:
Hart, Pearson, Vezina.

	The Hart Memorial trophy is for the league's most valuable player.  The Lester B. Pearson award is for the league's outstanding player as voted by the players, and the William M. Jennings trophy is for the goalie who gives up the least goals in a season.

questions.text: What happened that caused Loungo to miss 24 games in 2008?
questions.explanation:
Injury.

	He injured his groin during a game with the Pittsburgh Penguins on November 22, 2008.  He got back in time to play in the all-star game.

questions.text: Luongo became the ____ Canucks captain in team history?
questions.explanation:
12th.

	He was named captain at the start of the 2008-09 season.  Since he is not allowed to wear a C on his jersey, he wears it on the front of his helmet instead.

questions.text: What number did Luongo wear for the Canucks during the 2008-09 season?
questions.explanation:
1.

	Luongo never said why he wears number 1, but he has worn it his whole career.

questions.text: How many saves did he make in a single game to break the Canucks single game save record in April 2007?
questions.explanation:
72.

	He broke the record during a playoff game in 2007 that went to several overtimes.

questions.text: How many all-star games did Roberto play while with Florida from 2001-2006?
questions.explanation:
1.

	He played in 2004, his best season in Florida.
